sentences.en: A vastly disproportionate burden falls on women for child care.
sentences.cn: 照料孩子的重担落在了女性身上。

sentences.en: But the big audit firms believe the risks are disproportionate.
sentences.cn: 但是四大认为收益相比自己承受的风险不值一提.

sentences.en: But you must not allow it to usurp a disproportionate share of your interest.
sentences.cn: 但你不应让它过多地占据你的兴趣.

sentences.en: Disproportionate head measurements may indicate hydrocephaly or microcephaly.
sentences.cn: 比例不符的头围可能表示脑积水或小头畸形.

sentences.en: Experts are also a vital group because they have a disproportionate influence on less experienced users.
sentences.cn: 专家也是非常重要的人群,因为他们对缺少经验的用户有着异乎寻常的影响.

sentences.en: If heterosexuality is normal, why a disproportionate number of mental patients heterosexual?
sentences.cn: 假如异性恋倾向才是正常, 为什麽又有这麽多的精神病患是异性恋 呢 ?

sentences.en: The area contains a disproportionate number of young middle-class families.
sentences.cn: 此地年轻的中产阶级家庭特别多。

sentences.en: the disproportionate amount of money being spent on defence
The punishment was grossly disproportionate to the crime.
sentences.cn: 这种惩罚与罪行极不相称.

sentences.en: There is something dangerous and disproportionate in its place in human nature, for whatever reason.
sentences.cn: 不管怎样,人性自身存在着某些危险的和不相称的东西.

sentences.en: This sentence is totally disproportionate to the alleged offence.
sentences.cn: 从所犯罪行来看，这一量刑完全不合理。

sentences.en: We spend a disproportionate amount of our income on rent.
sentences.cn: 我们的收入花在房租上的比例太大了.

sentences.en: We spend a disproportionate amount of our money on rent.
sentences.cn: 我们花在房租上的钱太多了.

sentences.en: Weak businesses usually require a disproportionate amount of management attention.
sentences.cn: 弱的生意通常需要不相称数量的管理注意.

sentences.en: You must not allow it to usurp a disproportionate share of your interest.
sentences.cn: 你不应让它过多地占据你的兴趣.

sentences.en: Your market report active but your order disproportionate try utmost.
sentences.cn: 你处市场据说不错,但订单不成比例,请尽力照顾为盼.

trans.tran_cn: 不成比例的，不相称的，不均衡的，打破平衡
trans.tran_en: too much or too little in relation to something else
